omni.title: The Omni Project
omni.subtitle: MSR Final Project (2018)
omni.description: Simultaneous operation of three omni-directional robots used for mapping the environment and manipulating large objects

argo.title: Argo

argo.description: An autonomous differential drive suitcase that uses AR tags to track and follow objects in its environment

day_zero.title: Day Zero Predictor
day_zero.subtitle: EECS349 Final (2018)
day_zero.description: Using machine learning to predict when a country will reach "Day Zero" - the time when its water supply is fully depleted

baxter.title: Inspector Baxter
baxter.subtitle: ME495 Final (2017)
baxter.description: An introductory ROS project that uses Rethink Robotics' Baxter to manipulate objects via speech commands

techtiles.title: Techtiles
techtiles.subtitle: Capstone Senior Design (2015)
techtiles.description: A washable, biometric shirt that measures heart rate, breathing rate, steps, distance, and energy - all sent to a mobile display

motor_controller.title: Motor Controller
motor_controller.subtitle: ME333 Final (2018)
motor_controller.description: A closed-loop PID DC motor controller with a MATLAB user interface for low level control

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Ongoing Project
portfolio.description: The current version of this site was made from scratch (and love) using the React framework

robotic_manipulation.title: Robotic Manipulation
robotic_manipulation.subtitle: ME449 Final (2017)
robotic_manipulation.description: Using inverse kinematics and control laws to simulate the KUKA youBot, a 5R wheeled robot

neural_net.title: Designing a Neural Network

neural_net.description: Learning how to build a library from scratch to implement different kinds of neural networks

path_planning.description: Using RRTs to explore spaces and avoid collisions from a bitmap image and from randomly generated circles
